mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_ID, o.ORDER_DATE, o.ORDER_STATUS, o.TOTAL_PRICE, o.ORDER_TYPE, o.USER_ID, o.GUEST_ID, o.RECEIVER_NAME, o.RECEIVER_PHONE, o.RECEIVER_POST_CODE, o.RECEIVER_ROAD_ADDRESS, o.RECEIVER_DETAIL_ADDRESS, o.DELIVERY_REQUEST, od.ORDER_DETAIL_NO, od.ORDER_COUNT, od.ORDER_PRICE, od.REFUND_CHECK, od.BOOK_NO, b.BOOK_NO, b.BOOK_RDATE, b.BOOK_TRANS, b.BOOK_STOCK, b.BOOK_STATE, b.BOOK_CATEGORY, b.BOOK_IMGURL, b.BOOK_INDEX, b.PUBLISHER_BOOK_REVIEW, p.isbn, p.title, p.discount, p.pubdate, p.publisher, p.author, p.description, p.link, p.image FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.ORDER_ID = od.ORDER_ID JOIN BOOK b ON od.BOOK_NO = b.BOOK_NO JOIN PRODUCT_API p ON b.isbn = p.isbn WHERE o.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT pa.title, pa.image, pa.discount, b.BOOK_NO AS bookNo, b.BOOK_RDATE AS bookRdate, b.BOOK_TRANS AS bookTrans, b.BOOK_STOCK AS bookStock, b.BOOK_STATE AS bookState, b.BOOK_CATEGORY AS bookCategory, b.isbn, b.BOOK_IMGURL AS bookImgUrl, b.BOOK_INDEX AS bookIndex, b.PUBLISHER_BOOK_REVIEW AS publisherBookReview FROM BOOK b JOIN PRODUCT_API pa ON b.isbn = pa.isbn WHERE b.isbn IN
#{isbnItem}

SELECT pa.title, -- 상품명 pa.image, -- 대표 이미지 pa.discount, -- 할인가 (실제 판매 가격) b.BOOK_NO AS bookNo, b.BOOK_RDATE AS bookRdate, b.BOOK_TRANS AS bookTrans, b.BOOK_STOCK AS bookStock, b.BOOK_STATE AS bookState, b.BOOK_CATEGORY AS bookCategory, b.isbn, b.BOOK_IMGURL AS bookImgUrl, b.BOOK_INDEX AS bookIndex, b.PUBLISHER_BOOK_REVIEW AS publisherBookReview, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT c WHERE c.isbn = b.isbn) AS commentCount FROM BOOK b JOIN PRODUCT_API pa ON b.isbn = pa.isbn WHERE b.isbn = #{isbn}

SELECT ua.USER_ADDRESS_ID AS userAddressId, ua.ADDRESS_NAME AS addressName, ua.POST_CODE AS postCode, ua.ROAD_ADDRESS AS roadAddress, ua.DETAIL_ADDRESS AS detailAddress, ua.IS_DEFAULT AS isDefault, ua.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NAME AS userName, u.USER_PHONE AS userPhone FROM USER_ADDRESS ua JOIN USER u ON ua.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE ua.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ua.IS_DEFAULT = 1

SELECT ua.USER_ADDRESS_ID AS userAddressId, ua.ADDRESS_NAME AS addressName, ua.POST_CODE AS postCode, ua.ROAD_ADDRESS AS roadAddress, ua.DETAIL_ADDRESS AS detailAddress, ua.IS_DEFAULT AS isDefault, ua.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NAME AS userName, u.USER_PHONE AS userPhone FROM USER_ADDRESS ua JOIN USER u ON ua.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE ua.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ua.IS_DEFAULT DESC, ua.USER_ADDRESS_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ADDRESS ( USER_ID, ADDRESS_NAME, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, POST_CODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, IS_DEFAULT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{addressName}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{postCode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, 0 )
